item.title: v108 : Mahtnan Gear (pl.)
item.description: Mahtnan gear (pl.) is the new gear set added v108, as part of a new season of TERA, namedly TERA : AWAKE. Mahtnan gear (pl.) differentiates itself from the previous Kaia’s Soul gear set by removing damage on enchant, and Infusion options.
